column2:
1 lb hamburger
salt to taste
3 cans Progresso minestrone soup
2 cans ranch style chili beans (Kroger brand)
1 can rotel diced tomatoes + green chilies
column3:
Fry a pound of hamburger and drain (use paper towel after drain)
Lightly salt fried hamburger
In a large pot put: soup, beans, tomatoes, and hamburger
Heat on medium heat
